comments.body:
I'd find this easier to read if the important operation was on a new line.

```suggestion
      for shmid in $(ipcs -m | sed 1,3d | awk '{print $2}' | sed '$d'); do
        ipcrm -m $shmid
      done
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@  - bash: |
      set -euo pipefail
      for shmid in $(ipcs -m | sed 1,3d | awk '{print $2}' | sed '$d'); do ipcrm -m $shmid; done
    name: clear_shm
